text: In Marvel Studios â€™ Avengers : Infinity War the mightiest superheroes in the universe are going head to head with Thanos in the most epic mashup of all time. And today, the wait is over because the film is finally here! ( BRB heading to the theater. ) Prepare yourself by finding out which character you are most like : 1 Pick one word to describe yourself : Eccentric Honest Complex Courageous Secretive Poised Scrappy Passionate Genius Loyal Sarcastic Mischievous Energetic Proud Ambitious 2 Which superpower or skill is most awesome to you? Genius engineer Super durability Super strength Weather control Master spy Super agility Ability to shrink Telekinesis Master inventor Expert marksman Expert pilot Magic skills Spider senses
